fixes.name: Gross Utilization %
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) / MAX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Limit]) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ABS(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])/MAX([Limit])) to DAX using ABS, SUM and MAX. All column references were fully qualified to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column].
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses aggregation (SUM and MAX), so it should be created as a measure.
